response:

2. Natural science - g
3. Physical science - b
4. Arithmetic - g
5. Earth science - b
6. Space science - g
7. Technology - b
8. Thought - g
9. Cultural studies - b
10. Creativity - g
11. Literature - b
12. English language - g
13. Melody - b
14. Chronicle - g

*smiling mischievously* I can't wait to see your choices, my love! *winking*
